info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 02 at 8:10PM MDT until June 03 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MDT SATURDAY FOR WEST CENTRAL VALLEY COUNTY... At 810 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing water flowing over US highway 2 near Hinsdale. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hinsdale, Tampico, Vandalia and The Bentonite Plant. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
